| Dependency           | Meaning                                                              |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `after:<jobid>`      | Runs after the specified job *starts*                                |
| `afterok:<jobid>`    | Runs only if the specified job finishes *successfully* (exit code 0) |
| `afternotok:<jobid>` | Runs only if the specified job *fails*                               |
| `afterany:<jobid>`   | Runs after the job ends, regardless of success or failure            |


sbatch --dependency=afterok:7540144 09_versatilediff_reconstruct.sh 7
